fields.name: Daily wellness
fields.description: Daily wellness involves maintaining a balanced lifestyle through healthy eating, regular exercise, mental health practices, staying hydrated, getting enough sleep, and nurturing relationships to promote overall well-being.

fields.name: Joint health
fields.description: Maintaining healthy joints through proper nutrition, regular exercise, stretching, and managing weight helps reduce pain and prevent conditions like arthritis.

fields.name: Gut Health
fields.description: A healthy gut is essential for digestion, immunity, and overall well-being. It can be supported by a fiber-rich diet, probiotics, hydration, and managing stress.

fields.name: Skin health
fields.description: Skin health involves staying hydrated, using sunscreen, cleansing and moisturizing regularly, eating a balanced diet, and avoiding harmful habits to maintain clear, healthy skin.

fields.name: Weight management
fields.description: Weight management is the process of adopting healthy habits, such as balanced eating, regular exercise, and behavioral changes, to achieve and maintain a healthy weight. It focuses on sustainable practices that improve overall health and prevent excess weight gain.

fields.name: Women’s Nutrition
fields.description: Women's nutritional needs vary through different life stages. A balanced diet rich in vitamins, minerals, and fiber supports hormonal health, bone health, and overall well-being.

fields.name: Diabetic Management
fields.description: Managing diabetes involves monitoring blood sugar levels, eating a balanced diet, staying active, and following prescribed treatments to keep blood sugar in check.

fields.name: Kids' Health
fields.description: Proper nutrition, regular physical activity, adequate sleep, and emotional support are crucial for kids' growth, development, and overall health.

fields.name: Heart Care
fields.description: Heart health involves maintaining a balanced diet, exercising regularly, managing stress, and avoiding smoking or excessive alcohol to prevent heart disease and maintain cardiovascular health.

fields.name: Ortho HP Tablet
fields.description:
Ortho HP Tablets contain a unique blend of 12 strong natural ingredients specially selected to support the joint's function. This also helps to reduce inflammation and lower the level of muscle pain. Whether it is arthritis, joint stiffness, or chronic muscle aching, Ortho HP offers an all-in-one solution for smooth body movement.

Blended with Ayurvedic staples like Chobchini, Ashwagandha, and Nirgundi not only treats pain but will foster a person's overall health by enhancing immunity and restoring overall well-being. Ortho HP is a safe and potent product targeted for powerful results.

fields.name: 4G Digestive Tablets
fields.description:
Discover the unmatched power of 4G Digestive Tablets, carefully formulated with 13 potent ingredients with over 13 ingredients which are fennel seeds (Sanai), amla (Indian gooseberry), Ajwain (Carom seed), jeera (Cumin seed), Kalimirch, Saunth, Kasni, Harar, Daru Haldi, Sharpunkha, Laung, Kutki, and Excipient. This will help you in either looking to improve your appetite or control inflammation. These tablets offer all-round digestive care. 

 

The superlative formula brings together ages-old Ayurvedic practices with attention to detail to fulfill your digestive needs. This also has Vitamin C which will help you support your immunity along with its antioxidant properties. It helps you to increase nutrient absorption with black pepper to protect liver cells with Kutki. Every ingredient is carefully selected to promote overall wellness. So, take the first step towards a healthier gut & a healthier you!

fields.name: VAT Pain
fields.description:
Rediscover mobility, freedom and comfort with VAT Pain. Formulated with just the right amount of powerful, natural ingredients, this targeted approach to discomfort and muscular tension helps find the balance to relax. Ingredients were chosen from a long line for their well-documented efficacy in furthering better overall health and activity through muscle relaxation.

VAT Pain's rapid absorption formula means relief is only moments away. Whether it is to recover from an intense day or as daily support for active living, this all-natural solution seamlessly fits into your wellness routine.

fields.name: Anti Diabetic Powder
fields.description:
Anti Diabetic Powder blends old Ayurvedic wisdom with modern health knowledge. The mixture of carefully chosen ingredients, working together to provide gentle yet effective help, does not contain harsh chemicals, as synthetic options would, and focuses on gentle yet strong herbal treatments that support long-term health without causing bad side effects.

 

Anti Diabetic Powder is ancient Ayurvedic wisdom combined with modern health insights for your wellness journey. The carefully selected ingredients of this powder work together in the natural balance of blood sugar, healthy insulin levels, and reduced sugar cravings. This holistic formula enhances metabolic function and supports the liver, kidneys, and muscles for better overall health.

fields.name: Super Tea Tablet
fields.description:
Feel the power of nature transforming with a Super Tea Tablet. It is a specially formulated mixture of ingredients selected for their phenomenal benefits. Ranging from helping in heart health to managing cravings, each ingredient plays its role in enhancing total well-being. Sipping your way to a vibrant life has never been easier.

The tablet dissolves effortlessly in lukewarm water, which gives a refreshing drink supporting the natural processes of the body. Whether it's morning, midday pause, or night-time. The Super Tea Tablet is a companion in the development of a balanced lifestyle.

fields.title: Specifications
fields.content:
Natural Weight Loss Support - The Garcinia cambogia and green tea extract work synergistically so as to support natural processes of burning fat, resulting in a healthy weight through time.

Calms Inflammation - The anti-inflammatory property of cinnamon extract provides soothing to the body, improving overall health through the Super Tea Tablet.

Promotes Alkaline Balance - Citric acid in lemon extracts helps neutralize acidity found in the body, maintaining a stable pH level that supports metabolic activity.

Elevates Nutrient Absorption - The black pepper extract ensures that the body fully absorbs necessary nutrients for full benefit from every meal.

Detoxifies for Better Energy - Wheatgrass powder and grape seed extract detox the body through natural cleansing methods, promoting immune function enhancement and increasing energy levels.

Enhances Metabolic Function - The combination of Tulsi and Moringa enhances the metabolism of your body to work efficiently and lead an active lifestyle.

Regulates Cholesterol and Blood Pressure - Black salt promotes healthy cholesterol levels and balances blood pressure, maintaining good health of the heart system and, therefore, overall well-being.

Improves Gut Health - Moringa and wheatgrass powder combine to ensure gut health while reducing digestive discomfort, among other components of a well-functioning digestive system.

fields.title: How-to-Use?
fields.content:
Using a Super Tea Tablet is very easy. You just take one tablet and keep it in a cup with lukewarm water or hot water. Then, until the tablet melts, it fizzes and melts completely. And then it releases its powerful preparation of natural ingredients into the water. You stir very gently and enjoy!

The process is very quick to ensure that you can also enjoy your wellness drink easily. Sip it slowly, letting the refreshing flavors and goodness of the ingredients rejuvenate your body. It will be a part of your daily routine to experience its full benefits, whether you start your day with it or enjoy it during a mid-afternoon break.

fields.title: Specifications
fields.content:
Supports Healthy Blood Sugar Levels- This powder formulation contains Gurmar, Karela, and Neem. Thus, it works out naturally for sugar management within one's body. This sugar allows your body to have enough energy to be maintained at an even level.

Maintains Natural Insulin Functions - It coordinates well with the Karela and Kutki herbs to enhance body insulin levels. Coordination in this way helps optimize metabolic function, putting your body at its top working capacity. 

Reduces Sugar Cravings - It is referred to as the "sugar destroyer." It helps curb sugar cravings and reduces the tendency to consume excess sugars in your diet and, therefore, ultimately supports your goals for better metabolic health.

Improves Metabolic Function - With Kutki, Neem, and its ingredients, it's the formula infused within our liver that enhances functionality to go with the kidney and the muscles. It is this harmonious trio of important organs that sustain metabolic harmony by working together.

Purifies and Revitalizes the Body - Anti-Diabetic Powder supports the body's overall harmony with a multi-faceted approach that focuses on improving circulation, detoxification, and overall resilience with time-tested herbs like Ashwagandha and Neem.

Rich in Antioxidants for Cellular Health - Dalchini (Cinnamon) is a potent antioxidant source, which protects your cells from oxidative stress. This supports long-term health and keeps you feeling rejuvenated.

Supports Healthy Digestion - The combination of Kutki and Karela maintains digestive balance. It enhances nutritional absorption and reduces pressure on your system, hence improving gut health.

fields.title: Specifications
fields.content:
Holistic Support for Muscle Relief - Formulated to soothe muscle aches, this preparation increases flexibility and promotes smooth movement so that you can stay ahead of the game in all your daily activities.

Quick-Absorption Formula - The fast-acting formula penetrates deeply to deliver quick results, allowing you to continue your active lifestyle without any stoppages or aches and pains.

Natural Detoxification - Detoxify with the cleansing action of Nagarmotha and Gokhru, supporting a healthier system and renewed energy.

Nutrient-Rich Blend - Enriched with Moringa and Mukta Shukta Bhasm, this blend contributes necessary nutrients towards strengthening joints and bones along with vibrancy to the whole body.

Improves Mobility and Joint Health - Rasnapan and Haldi together nourish joint health, improve mobility, and ensure smooth, pain-free movement throughout your day.

Antioxidant Benefits - Ingredients such as Dev Daru and Haldi provide strong antioxidant support, shielding your body from oxidative stress and supporting recovery and resilience.

Dosha Balance - This product is formulated to balance the Vat, Pitt, and Cough doshas, harmonizing your body's natural energies and contributing to your overall wellness.

Enhanced Energy and Stamina - The energizing properties of Ashwagandha and Sudh Kuchla give you a more natural boost to your stamina and vivacity, making you all the more revitalized and poised for any challenge.

fields.title: How-to-Use?
fields.content:
The VAT Pain is quite smooth and not too difficult to use; it comes in a powdered form. Take 2-3 grams and follow with lukewarm or fresh water to swallow it comfortably. Then drink lukewarm or fresh water. Such a soft but strong formula ensures quick absorption and relief.

Best results should be achieved when taken twice daily after meals. It will remove pain and stiffness simultaneously with the maintenance of healthy joints and muscles for a more active life. You can also consult with a healthcare professional as well.

fields.title: Specifications
fields.content:
Supports Liver Function and Liver Detoxification - Substances like milk thistle and antioxidants often promote overall liver health. These compounds support the liver’s natural detoxification and also help liver cells protect themselves from any kind of damage.

Increases Metabolism and Digestion - There are a lot of vitamins and minerals such as Vitamin C which help to improve metabolism. So, if your metabolism improves, your digestion automatically improves. Fibers, probiotics, and enzymes are commonly associated with good digestion. This can be enhanced with 4G Digestive tablets.

Anti-Inflammatory Properties for Overall Health - This contains turmeric, cumin seeds, and curcumin as well, which has anti-inflammatory properties. This helps in cleaning your gut and liver which promotes being healthy liver. Therefore, providing improved liver and gut health. This also has Omega 3, which also repairs the fatty liver. 

Improves Appetite Control and Weight Management - The various herbs and compounds such as fennel seeds, carom seeds, Saunth, and a lot more. These are considered to increase appetite and also support your overall weight management. The other digestive enzymes and probiotics also help in weight control and management. 

Enhances Gut Barrier Function for Better Immunity - The 4G Digestive Tablets fortify the stomach lining with Amla, which is rich in Vitamin C, as well as Haritaki. A healthy gut lining will block unwanted harmful substances and toxins from passing into the bloodstream, thus making one's immune system strong and healthy.

fields.title: Specifications
fields.content:
Supports Joint Health and Mobility—Ortho HP Infusion provides nutrients directly into the cartilage, decreasing stiffness. Glucosamine and Salai Guggal interact in their respective individual ways to repair and preserve joint tissues for smooth, pain-free movement.

Reduces Inflammation Naturally - Ortho HP is a powerhouse with anti-inflammatory herbs like Saunth, Kalimirch, and Rasna that keep the inflammation at its root. Ingredients within the medicine reduce swelling in joints caused due to arthritis and gout.

Relieves Muscle Pain and Stress - Whether it is chronic muscle ache or soreness after exercising, Ortho HP's calming effect on the muscles douses the discomfort practically immediately while furthering tissue repair by Sudh Kuchla and Ashwagandha.

Improves Holistic Wellness - Ingredients like Chobchini, and Nirgundi will address the root causes of joint and muscle issues. This will provide long-lasting relief and promote overall well-being. This will improve your holistic wellness providing you round-the-clock energy.

Aids Muscle Recovery and Pain Relief - Shudh Kuchla and Saunth are known to soften the tissue, provide relaxation, and relax muscles. Stress on muscles and joints due to repetitive strain or physical activity is also diminished by these ingredients.

Enhances Mental Clarity and Stress Relief - Ortho HP ingredients such as Ashwagandha and Pippal bring about mental well-being by reducing the stress and anxiety that chronic pain causes. A quiet and calm mind is a complement to physical healing for your all-around wellness.

Boosts Immunity and Overall Health - Loh Bhasm and Garlic can improve the body's natural defenses, boost iron levels, assist in digestion, and increase the average lifespan of cells. These highly potent ingredients ensure that your body stays resilient against illness while also addressing health concerns in joints and muscles.

fields.title: How-to-Use?
fields.content:
For better results, take 1-2 Ortho HP Tablets twice a day with water after consulting your healthcare professional. Therefore, consistency is the key; incorporate this regime into your daily routine. 

For added effectiveness of the tablets, accompany these with a balanced diet that is rich in nutrients, accompanied by a routine exercise pattern that helps maintain joint flexibility and the overall soundness of your body. Always follow the dosage instructions provided by your healthcare professionals to ensure safe and optimal results.

fields.title: Q1. Who can use the Super Tea Tablet?
fields.content: It is perfect for anyone looking for natural support with weight management, heart health, detoxification, or immunity boosters.

fields.title: Q2. Are there any side effects?
fields.content: Super Tea Tablet is prepared from natural ingredients, which makes it safe to be used regularly. You may consult a healthcare professional before its use if you have pre-existing conditions or dietary restrictions.

fields.title: Q3. How long does it take to see results?
fields.content: The results vary based on the lifestyle and the extent of usage. Most of its users experience benefits after several weeks of regular usage.

fields.title: Q4. Can it be consumed daily?
fields.content: Yes, the Super Tea Tablet is designed for daily use. Enjoy it as part of your routine to maximize its benefits.

fields.title: Q1. Who can benefit from Anti Diabetic Powder?
fields.content: The person seeking natural support for stabilized blood sugar levels, low cravings for sugar, and more sound metabolic health can benefit from this herbal formulation.

fields.title: Q2: Are there any side effects?
fields.content: Always choose 100% pure natural herbs for Anti Diabetic Powder. Always consult with your healthcare professional if you have a pre-existing medical condition or are on medication before embarking on any new supplements.

fields.title: Q3: Can it be used daily?
fields.content: Yes, Anti Diabetic Powder is to be used daily as part of an integrated wellness program. Use it as directed for continuous benefit.

fields.title: Q4: How soon can I expect results?
fields.content: Results vary from person to person based on health and lifestyle conditions, but most people notice improvements in a few months after using the product frequently.

fields.title: Q1. Can VAT Pain be used daily?
fields.content: Yes, VAT Pain is a natural product for daily usage. All its natural ingredients ensure its safe usage for everyday needs with flexibility and reduction in long-term pain levels.

fields.title: Q2. Is it suitable for all skin types?
fields.content: Yes, VAT Pain is made of soft natural ingredients friendly to all skin types. However, it is always advisable to do a patch test before using it for the first time, especially if you have sensitive skin.

fields.title: Q3. How quickly does it work?
fields.content: VAT Pain gives quick relief taken in for several minutes; the chronic cases will benefit to the maximum and permanently with daily application.

fields.title: Q4. Can it help with chronic joint discomfort?
fields.content: Yes, VAT Pain supports joint health, especially through Rasnapan and Haldi ingredients. It can be especially useful if taken regularly for sustained care and relief.

fields.title: Q1. Who can benefit from 4G Digestive Tablets?
fields.content: Anyone suffering from digestive issues, low metabolism, or liver-related problems can benefit. It's also good for those who want to naturally help improve gut health and increase appetite.

fields.title: Q2. Are there any side effects of 4G Digestive Tablets?
fields.content: The tablets are naturally made and safe, but you should first see a healthcare professional if you are pregnant, breastfeeding, or taking any other medication.

fields.title: Q3. How long does it take to see results?
fields.content: Most individuals notice changes within a couple of weeks since the intake according to the prescription. Results may vary in effect due to an individual’s health conditions.

fields.title: Q4. Can 4G Digestive Tablets help with fatty liver?
fields.content: Yes, elements like omega-3 fatty acids and Kutki would also contribute to cutting down liver fats and conditions of the liver. Thereby, supporting overall liver health.

fields.title: Q1. Who can benefit from Ortho HP Tablets?
fields.content: It can be of benefit to anyone who experiences joint or muscle pain, inflammation, or arthritis. And it’s good for those who want to naturally improve mobility and overall health.

fields.title: Q2. Are there any side effects?
fields.content: The good news is that it is made of all-natural and generally safe ingredients. Consult a physician before using, especially if pregnant, breastfeeding, or taking other medications.

fields.title: Q3. How long does it take to see results?
fields.content: After 2-3 weeks of regular use, many users notice relief. However, results may vary based on the individual’s health condition and how closely they are following the recommended dosage.

fields.title: Q4. Is it safe for daily use?
fields.content: Yes, Ortho HP Tablets are for long-term use. Take the prescribed dosage for maximum benefits.

fields.title: Privacy Policy
fields.content:
Personal Information 

Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited is a company incorporated and registered under the provisions of the Companies Act, 2013 and has its registered office at 2A/3 Front Side Kundan Mansion, Asaf Ali Road, Ajmeri Gate Extension, Central Delhi, Delhi-110002, India. Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited is the owner of the brand Herbal Power and the website of herbalpowerindia.com (“Website”). This Privacy Policy outlines Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited’s approach to data protection and privacy to fulfil its obligation under the applicable laws and regulations. 

Throughout this document, ‘we’, ‘us’, ‘our’, ‘ours’ refers to Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited. Wherever we have said ‘you’ or ‘your’, this means YOU. 

We are committed to treating data privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy provides the necessary details about how your data is collected and used by us on the Website. As a visitor/ customer to the Website, you are advised to please read the Privacy Policy carefully. By accessing the services provided by us on the Website, you agree to the collection and use of your data by us in the manner provided for under this Privacy Policy. 

Personal information gathered by us 

As part of your registration process on our Website, we may collect the following information which is personally identifiable to you, including, without limitation, your name including first and last name, email address, mobile phone number, contact details, username along with password you have created for setting up your account on the Website, your date of birth, age, gender, residential address, shipping address, postal code, information about the pages that you visited/ accessed on the Website, the links you clicked on the Website, the number of times you visited/ accessed a particular page on the Website and any such browsing information etc. We might receive certain information about you from other sources, such as updated delivery status and the shipping address information provided by you to our carriers, which we shall use to correct our records so as to enable us to deliver your next purchase more easily. 

You can choose not to share your personal information with us, but then you might not be able to use and access all the services provided by us on the Website. We use your personal information that you provided for opening your account with us, without limitation, for processing your transactions, responding to your requests and/ or queries and for communicating with you. 

Why do we collect your personal information 

We will collect personally identifiable information about you as part of a voluntary registration process or through an online survey or through any combination thereof. The information that we learn and gather from you, personal or otherwise, is used for registering you on our Website, verifying your identity so as to permit you to use the Website, for undertaking transactions to facilitate the process of your payment on the Website, to communicate with you, to convey any of our promotional offers to you, to communicate and update you with regards to our products and services as well as for maintaining your account with us. 

We use your information to operate, provide, develop and improve our products and services. Without limitation, these purposes include: 

  1. We use your information to accept, handle and process your orders, deliver the product/s you ordered, process payments for the order placed by you on our website, to communicate with you regarding the status of your order and for providing you with promotional offers. 

  1. We use your personal information to provide functionality as well as to analyse the performance of our website so as to fix any errors and further, to improve the user ability as well as the effectiveness of our website. 

  1. We use your personal information to recommend certain promotions and products that might be of your interest. Further, we use your personal information to identify your preferences and to personalize your experience on the Website. 

  1. We use your personal information to communicate with you via different channels e.g. phone, e-mail or chat, in relation to your use of our website i.e. your orders placed, queries raised, to recommend certain promotional offers being run on our products etc. 

  1. We use your personal information to display interest-based advertisements that might be of interest to you, with regards to certain of our products as provided for on our website. 

Manner of collection of information 

We receive and store information whenever you interact with us through the Website or from other sources e.g. updated delivery status and address information provided by you to our carriers. When you browse, access or use the Website, our servers may collect information, directly or indirectly, regarding your activities on our website by way of either cookies or permissions or other trackers. 

Our website may contain links to other third-party websites, for which we are not to be held responsible for the privacy practices of such third-party websites, which we do not own, manage or control. Further, some web browsers have a “Do Not Track” feature. This feature lets you inform the concerned website that you have visited that you do not wish to have your online activity tracked on the said website. These features are not yet uniform across all browsers. Our website is not currently set up to respond to those signals. 

Consent 

By using our website and/ or by providing your personal information while registering your account on our website, you consent to the collection and use of the information you disclose on our website in accordance with this Privacy Policy, including but not limited to your consent for sharing your information as per this Privacy Policy. By accessing and using the Website, you accept the terms of the Privacy Policy, Terms of Use, Shipping Policy as well as Cancellation Policy and further, consent to our use and disclosure of your personal information in any manner as described in the Privacy Policy. 

When your personal information may be disclosed to other parties 

We do not sell or share your personal information with any third party for commercial gain/ profit. We may share or be required to share your personal information, without limitation, as follows; 

  1. with our business associates/ partners in order to deliver you the products that you have ordered from our website; 

  1. with our payment gateway partner when you initiated a payment using your credit/ debit card on our website; 

  1. with the concerned authorities when it is a legal obligation to do so e.g. to assist with detecting and preventing fraud; 

  1. with the concerned authorities when it is a requirement in connection with regulatory reporting, litigation or asserting or defending legal rights and interests; 

  1. when we have a legitimate business reason for doing so; 

  1. when we want to send you information and promotional material regarding our products and services; 

  1. when we have asked you for your consent to share it, and you’ve agreed to the same; and 

  1. to improve your online shopping experience with us. 

With whom your personal information will be shared 

We will not use your financial information for any purpose other than to complete a transaction/order that you have placed with us through our website. We do not rent, sell or share your personal information and will not disclose any of your personally identifiable information to third parties except in cases where you placed an order for our products and such information is necessary to be shared with our third-party associates’ partners so as to ensure that the said products are successfully delivered to you. We have appropriate contracts in place with our third-party partners. This means that they cannot do anything with your personal information, which is outside the scope permitted by us. Our third-party partners hold your personal information securely and retain it only for the period specified in our contract with them. Further, we may use your personal information for promotional offers, to help investigate, prevent or take action regarding unlawful and illegal activities, suspected fraud, potential threat to the safety and security of any person, violation of the Website’s terms of use or to defend against legal claims; special circumstances such as compliance with court’s orders, requests/ orders from legal authorities or law enforcement agencies requiring such disclosure. 

How do we secure and protect your personal information 

We are committed to protecting your personal information, which is collected, possessed and stored by us. We have in place security measures and appropriate physical, technical and managerial safeguards to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, transmission and deletion. Our servers are only accessible to certain authorized personnel and your personal information is shared with the concerned personnel on a strict need to know basis so as to complete the transaction and to provide you with the products requested by you from our website. Though we strive to maintain and safeguard the confidentiality of your personal identifiable information, transmissions made by means of the internet cannot be made absolutely secure. By using this Website, you agree that we shall have no liability for disclosure of your information due to errors in transmission or due to any unauthorized acts committed by third parties. We keep the information collected from you on our systems or with our third parties for as long as it is required for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy and for legal and regulatory reasons. We shall take all reasonable steps to delete your personal data that is no longer required. By accessing the Website and by providing us with your information, you agree; 

  1. that we can communicate with you electronically regarding the security, privacy and administrative issues relating to your use of our website; and 

  1. that we can take adequate physical, managerial and technical safeguards to preserve the integrity and security of your data till the time you use and access our website. 

The data collected from the customers on the Website is stored in the servers of HOSTINGER PTE LTD ("Hostinger") and appropriate security measures compliant with the Information Technology Act, 2000 and the Information Technology (Reasonable Security Practices and Procedures and Sensitive Personal Data or Information) Rules, 2011 have been undertaken by Hostinger to protect the data against unauthorized access to or unauthorized alteration, disclosure, or destruction. These include internal reviews of data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures, including appropriate encryption and physical security measures to guard against unauthorized access to systems where personal data is stored. 

Personal information 

Gathered by us: - 

  1. Your Password Setting Up your Account 

  1. Your Spouse’s Name 

  1. Your Mother’s name 

  1. Your Nominees Name & Details Space Column for Nominees Details 

Personal information may we have Disclosed to Business Associates. 

Procedure to be followed for correcting any inaccuracies in your personal information submitted to us 

To correct or to update any information that you have provided to us, our website allows you to do the same online itself. In the event of loss of access details. 

Contact us 

For any further queries and complaints related to privacy under the applicable laws and regulations, you could reach us at: 

Contact email address: care@herbalpowerindia.com 

Phone: +91 1204177306  

Contact days: Monday to Saturday (11 AM to 6 PM) 

In accordance with the Information and Technology Act 2000 and Rules as well as the Consumer Protection Act 2019 and Rules made thereunder, the name and contact details of the Grievance Officer are provided below: 

Address: 2A/3 Front Side Kundan Mansion, Asaf Ali Road, Ajmeri Gate Extension, Central Delhi, Delhi-110002, India. 

We urge you to provide a detailed description of the information, violation, objectionable content, or your complaint/grievance, to allow us to effectively resolve your request. We make our best efforts to resolve grievances within 30 days of receiving a complaint, or within the timelines stipulated under applicable law.

fields.title: Terms & Conditions
fields.content:
Please read these Terms of Conditions and the Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited. Privacy Policy, located at https://www.herbalpowerindia.com/privacy-policy before using this this website or purchasing any products from Herbal Power. 

These Terms of Use are an agreement (the “Agreement”) between Herbal Power (the “Company,” “we” or “us”) and you ("you" or "User"). This Agreement sets forth the legal terms and conditions governing your use of this website and each Independent Associate’s Platform and each Web Property (collectively referred to herein as the "Site") and for your purchase. 

If you do not agree to be bound by this Agreement, do not access or otherwise use the Site or participate in any of the goods and/or services. If you are dissatisfied with the Site or other goods and/or services, your sole and exclusive remedy is to stop using the Site or goods and/or services, except for the limited warranties that may apply to Herbal Power product or as otherwise expressly stated in Clause Five of this Agreement (Herbal Power Guarantee). 

The Privacy Policy constitute the entire agreement between you and us pertaining to the subject matter hereof and supersede all prior or other arrangements, understandings, negotiations and discussions, whether oral or written. No waiver of any of the provisions of this Agreement shall constitute a waiver of any other provisions hereof (whether or not similar), nor shall any such waiver constitute a continuing waiver unless otherwise expressly provided. 

1. MODIFICATIONS 

From time to time, we reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to modify, update, add to, discontinue, remove, revise or otherwise change any portion of this Agreement, in whole or in part, at any time. 

The most current version of this Agreement will be available on the Site and will supersede all previous versions of this Agreement. The Site or the goods and/or services, in whole or in part, may be enhanced, modified or discontinued at our sole discretion. Any enhancements, additions or modifications to the Site or goods and/or services will be subject to this Agreement. 

2. ACCESS 

You must obtain access to the Internet and pay any service fees associated with such access to use the Site. In addition, you must have all equipment necessary for you to access the Internet. You are and will remain solely responsible for the purchase, hookup, installation, loading, operation and maintenance of any hardware, software, telephone (cable or other) service, and the Internet access service to your personal computer and for all related costs. You are solely responsible for scanning your hardware and software for computer viruses and other related problems before you use them. We expressly disclaim any liability or responsibility for any errors or failures relating to the malfunction or failure of your hardware or software in connection with the use of the Site. 

3. ELIGIBILITY 

16 years of age or older and have agreed to this Agreement. Certain features on this Site (including, but not limited to, user registration). 

4. INDEPENDENT HERBAL POWER ASSOCIATES 

Herbal Power products and services are sold through direct selling channel of sales and distribution i.e. to/through Herbal Power Independent Associates. To purchase Herbal Power goods or services, you do not have to become an Independent Associate. If, however, you are interested in starting your own business as an Independent Herbal Power Associates, please call see our Associate Services Department. 

5. HERBAL POWER GUARANTEE 

Herbal Power ensures through its manufacturers and/or exporters the guarantee of its products as stipulated under the applicable respective statutes. We are confident that our customers will find our products satisfactory. However, if for any reason, a customer is not satisfied with any Herbal Power products, Herbal Power shall ensure exchange or refund through its Associates. Simply request a refund within thirty (30) days from your receipt of the product by contacting an Independent Associate of Herbal Power. This guarantee is limited only by the terms of certain specific warranties attached to or packaged with certain products and does not apply to any product intentionally damaged or misused. 

6. YOUR INFORMATION AND YOUR PRIVACY 

If you provide information to the Site, you agree to provide accurate, current and complete information about you were requested and you agree to maintain and update such information as appropriate. We will use and maintain any information about you that we collect through the Site in accordance with our Privacy Policy, located at https://www.herbalpowerindia.com/privacy-policy. 

7. USER FORMS 

Forums, bulletin boards, chat rooms or other interactive areas that are or may be offered on the Site ("User Forums") are provided to give users a forum to express their opinions and share their ideas and information. The individual who posts content in the User Forums ("Community Content") is responsible for the reliability, accuracy, and truthfulness of such content, and we have no control over the same. Additionally, we have no control over whether any such posted material is of a nature that users will find offensive, distasteful or otherwise unacceptable and expressly disclaims any responsibility for such material. We do not and cannot review every message posted by users in the User Forums, and are not responsible for the content of these messages or the views or opinions expressed by the users of the User Forums. Information disclosed in the User Forums is by design revealed to the public. 

You agree to comply with the "Community Guidelines" set forth below. Without limiting our other rights and remedies, individuals who violate the following Community Guidelines may, at our sole discretion, be permanently banned from using the Site: harass, stalk or otherwise abuse another user; transmit, post, send, upload, distribute, submit or otherwise make available any content that is false, harmful, threatening, abusive, tortious, defamatory, libelous, disparaging (including disparaging of Herbal Power), vulgar, obscene, pornographic or that promotes violence, racial hatred, terrorism or illegal acts. 

The Site any personal advertising, junk mail, spam, chain letters, pyramid schemes or offer for sale of any products or services, except in areas, if any, specifically designated for such purposes; or violate any applicable laws local, state, central or international law, rule or regulation. transmit, post, send, upload, distribute, submit or otherwise make available through the Site any content containing any solicitation of funds, promotion, advertising, or solicitation for goods or services. 

"Frame”, “mirror” or “deep link” any part of the Site without our prior written authorization. link to any page within the Site or other goods and/or services from any web site or web page that makes any claims as to the curative or health enhancing powers of any substance. 

8. USE OF E-MAIL ADDRESSES PROVIDED BY THE SITE 

When using any e-mail address provided to you on or through the Site, you agree to use such email address in accordance with all applicable laws and not to transmit to any person or entity: any content that violates the Community Guidelines. 

9. OUR PROPRIETARY RIGHTS 

This Site and all of the content it contains, or may in the future contain, including but not limited to articles, opinions, other text, directories, guides, photographs, illustrations, images, video and audio clips and advertising copy, as well as the trademarks, copyrights, logos, domain names, code, trade names, service marks, patents and any and all copyrightable material (including source and object code) and/or any other form of intellectual property (collectively, the "Material") are owned by or licensed to us or other authorized third parties and are protected from unauthorized use, copying and dissemination by copyright, trademark, publicity and other laws and by international treaties. Unless expressly permitted in writing by us, you shall not capture, reproduce, perform, transfer, sell, license, modify, create derivative works from or based upon, republish, reverse engineer, upload, edit, post, transmit, publicly display, frame, link, distribute. 

10. ASSOCIATESHIP AND REGISTRATION 

Certain areas of the Site may require registration or may otherwise ask you to provide information to participate in certain features or to access certain content. The Site practices governing your personal information are disclosed in its Privacy Policy. The decision to provide this information is purely voluntary and optional; however, if you elect not to provide such information, you may not be able to access certain content or participate in certain features of the Site. 

11. PROMOTIONS 

This Site may contain permitted promotions that require you to send material or information about yourself. Please note that such promotions offered via the Site may be, and often are, governed by a separate set of rules that, in addition to describing such promotions, may have eligibility requirements, such as certain age or geographic area restrictions, terms and conditions governing the use of material you submit, and disclosures about how your personal information may be used. It is your responsibility to read such rules to determine whether or not you want to and are eligible to participate, register and/or enter. By entering any such promotion, you agree to comply with abide by such rules and the decisions of the sponsor(s) identified therein, which shall be final and binding in all respects. 

12. TERMINATION; MODIFICATION 

We will determine your compliance with this Agreement in our sole discretion and our decision shall be final and binding. Any violation of this Agreement may result in restrictions on your access to all or part of the Site (including any Web Property or email address provided by the Site) and may be referred to law enforcement authorities. No waiver of any of this Agreement shall be of any force or effect unless made in writing and signed by a duly authorized officer of Herbal Power. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue this Site, or any portion thereof without notice to you or any third party. Upon termination of your associateship or access to the Site, or upon demand by Herbal Power, you must destroy all materials obtained from this Site and all related documentation and all copies and installations thereof. You are advised that we will aggressively enforce our rights to the fullest extent of the law. If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid by any court having competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of such provision will not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of this Agreement, which will remain in full force and effect. The section titles in this Agreement are for your convenience only and do not have any legal or contractual effect. 

13. JURISDICTION 

The laws of apply to this Agreement. Any dispute between you and us must be brought before the courts located in Delhi, India. You hereby consent and submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Delhi for any cause of action relating to or arising under this Agreement or the Site. 

14. SEVERABILITY 

Should one of the provisions of this Term of Use be invalid or declared invalid by a court, this will not affect the validity of the remaining terms. 

15. ABILITY TO ACCEPT AGREEMENT 

You affirm that you are 18 years of age or older and are fully able and competent to enter into the terms, conditions, obligations, affirmations, representations, and warranties set forth in this Agreement, and to abide by and comply with the terms and conditions of this Agreement. 

16. CONTACT US 

If you have any questions, comments or concerns about our Site, any goods and/or services or this Agreement, you may contact us at +911204177306.

Last Revised on ©2025 Herbal Power. All Rights Reserved and licensed user Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited. 

FSSAI License No. 12724999000640 

Before embarking on any physical activity, please consult with your physician. Herbal Power products are not intended to diagnose, treat, prevent or cure any disease. Please see individual product label for detailed information.

fields.title: Shipping and Delivery Policy
fields.content:
Orders may be placed online on website and Mobile App. Details are given below: 

Home Delivery: Home Delivery orders can be placed on website or Herbal Power App only. 

Payment: Payment mode options for these orders can be: 

  • Orders placed at Website: Credit Card, Debit Card, Net Banking, Paytm, Google Pay. 

  • Orders placed at Herbal Power App: Credit Card, Debit Card, Net Banking, Paytm, Google Pay. 

Standard Delivery orders will be delivered within: 

  • Local: 3-6 business days from the order date. 

  • Outside Delivery Area (Remote Locations):8-12 business days from the order date 

We deliver only on business days. 

 

Home Delivery Orders Delivery fees 

 

Order Type 

Order Value 

New HD Charges 

Self-Order 

< Rs.1000 

Free 

 

Order Type 

Order Value 

Home Delivery Charges 

Single Order 

< Rs.5000 

Free 

 

>= Rs.5000/- 

Free 

 

Notification of changes in the Shipping and Delivery Policy 

We keep our Shipping and Delivery Policy under review to make sure it is up to date and accurate. Any changes we make to this Policy in the future will be posted on this page. We reserve the right to change or update this Policy at any time without any prior intimation to you. Such changes shall be effective immediately upon posting on our Website. You are required to review the Policy regularly to keep yourself abreast of the changes, if any. 

Shipping Information 

  • Shipping Method: We partner with trusted carriers to ensure the safe and timely delivery of your orders. Our shipping methods are selected to provide the best possible service for your specific location. 

  • Order Tracking: For your convenience, we provide order tracking information. Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email or sms, allowing you to monitor the progress of your delivery. 

  • Shipping Fees: For orders below the specified amount (if applicable), shipping fees will be calculated based on your location and the weight of the products in your order. You will see the shipping charges during the checkout process before you finalize your purchase. 

Delivery Address 

Accurate Information: To ensure the successful delivery of your order, please provide accurate and complete delivery address information during the checkout process. We cannot be held responsible for delivery issues resulting from incorrect or incomplete address details. 

Delivery Confirmation 

Signature Requirement: In some cases, a signature may be required upon delivery to ensure the safe receipt of your order. Please check the carrier’s delivery policies for further details. 

Contact Us 

If you have any questions or concerns regarding your order’s shipping and delivery, please do not hesitate to contact our customer support team at mail: care@herbalpowerindia.com. We are here to assist you and provide the information you need to track your order or address any delivery-related inquiries. 

Thank you for choosing  www.herbalpowerindia.com.  We appreciate your trust in us, and we are committed to delivering your wellness products in a timely and efficient manner.

fields.title: Return Policy
fields.content:
We stand behind the quality of Herbal power products 

Herbal Power stands behind the quality of its products and guarantees your satisfaction. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with the products, you may return it within 7days of purchase for a refund as per the terms of the Returns Policy. 

The refund policy is applicable only for products in marketable condition and accompanied with an invoice. This policy does not apply to products that have been intentionally damaged or misused. It is incumbent upon. 

What is the general return policy on Herbal Power? 

We want to ensure you have a hassle-free shopping experience, where you can confidently make purchases. 
Herbal Power provides the 7 Days Money Back. 

What is the Herbal Power Return Policy? 

If you have received a damaged item or it does not match the description provided by the Herbal Power, you can return it to the Herbal Power and get a replacement within 7days of delivery at no extra cost. 

Please contact us with your replacement request within 7days from the date of delivery of the product. Once the Herbal Power accepts the return request, the item will be recalled and a replacement will be shipped to you. 

What is the 7 Days Replacement Guarantee? 

If you have received a damaged or defective product, you can return it to get a replacement within 7 days of delivery at no extra cost. 

Please contact us with a replacement request within 7 days of delivery. The item will be recalled and a brand-new replacement will be shipped to you at no extra cost. 

The product should be returned in its actual condition at the time of delivery. Please ensure that Herbal Power products are not used. Retain original tags and accessories. Branded packaging should be returned in an undamaged condition with the product. 

What are the conditions for initiating a return? 

Damages due to misuse of product are not covered under the policy. Consumable items that have been used. Products with tampered or missing serial numbers are likewise ineligible. 

Damage’ or ‘defect’ is as defined under the manufacturer’s warranty. Please return the item in the actual condition you received it with all its original packaging and accessories. 

Replacement can be for the entire product or part(s) of the product subject to availability of the same. 

How do I return an item purchased on www.herbalpowerindia.com? 

To return an item purchased on www.herbalpowerindia.com, please refer to the corresponding return policy of the Herbal Power. You can then contact us for initiating the return. 

How do I cancel an order? 

You can cancel your order online before the product has been shipped. Your entire order amount will be refunded. 

In case your product has been shipped but has not yet been delivered, to cancel Contact Us. 

Back to Source – In this case, the money will be refunded back to the source that was originally used to make the transaction. 

Contact For Cancellations and Return Policy 

Write us to care@herbalpowerindia.com with subject line Cancellations and Returns Policy or call on +91 1204177306 for more details about the Cancellations And Returns Policy. Send your inquiry by filling your details as Contact Us

fields.title: Struggling to Stay Consistent with Your Fitness Goals? We Get It!
fields.content:
Struggling to Stay Consistent with Your Fitness Goals? We Get It!

Hey there, we know how tough it can be to stick to a fitness routine. Life gets busy, motivation dips, and sometimes, it feels like no matter how hard you try, you just can’t make progress. It’s frustrating, right? You’re not alone in feeling this way, and trust us—we’ve all been there.

Fitness isn’t a one-size-fits-all journey. Whether you’re struggling to find time, battling exhaustion, or feeling like you’ve hit a plateau, we totally understand. Let’s talk about how you can get back on track and, more importantly, how to enjoy the process along the way.

1. We Know the "I Don’t Have Time" Struggle

Life’s busy. Between work, family, social commitments, and just trying to catch your breath, finding time to work out can feel impossible. We've all been there. But here's the thing—getting in even a short workout can make a world of difference. You don’t need to spend hours at the gym to see results. Even 20 minutes of movement a day can boost your energy, improve your mood, and set the tone for a healthier lifestyle.

Pro Tip: Try breaking your workouts into smaller chunks. Maybe a 10-minute morning stretch and a 15-minute evening walk. It’s all about consistency over perfection.

2. Feeling Tired All the Time? We Hear You.

Sometimes, the last thing you want to do after a long day is work out. We totally get it—when you’re drained, exercising feels like the last thing on your mind. But here’s a little secret: exercise actually gives you more energy! Sounds counterintuitive, but moving your body can help boost your circulation, get your heart pumping, and leave you feeling more awake and alert.

Pro Tip: Start with something gentle—like a walk or some light yoga. Even if it’s just 10 minutes, it’ll help you feel less sluggish. And who knows? You might just feel like doing more once you get started.

3. Not Seeing Results? That’s Frustrating. We Know.

If you’ve been putting in the effort but don’t feel like you’re getting anywhere, it’s completely normal to feel discouraged. But here’s something important: results take time. Fitness isn’t a quick fix—it’s a long-term commitment to yourself and your health. Trust us, it’ll pay off in the end.

It’s also worth noting that progress isn't always measured by the scale or by how many pounds you’ve lifted. Sometimes, it’s the little things—like being able to walk up stairs without getting winded or noticing that your clothes fit a little better—that mean you’re on the right path.

Pro Tip: Celebrate the small victories, no matter how minor they may seem. They all add up to bigger wins!

4. Lack of Motivation? We Feel You.

There’s no denying it—staying motivated is tough. Some days, you’re fired up and ready to crush it; other days, the couch looks a lot more appealing than the gym. And that’s okay! Fitness isn’t about being perfect every single day—it’s about showing up, even when you don’t feel like it.

Pro Tip: Find a workout buddy or join a fitness class. Having someone to share the journey with can keep you motivated on the days you want to throw in the towel.

5. The Guilt Trap: "I Should Be Doing More"

If you’ve ever felt guilty for skipping a workout or indulging in that slice of cake, you’re not alone. We all have those moments where we feel like we’re falling behind. But here’s the truth: fitness isn’t about being perfect 100% of the time. It’s about balance. If you miss a workout or enjoy a treat, that’s okay! What matters is getting back at it the next day.

Pro Tip: Be kind to yourself. Fitness isn’t a punishment—it’s a way to take care of your body and mind. No one’s perfect, and that’s what makes the journey so human.

Final Thoughts: You’ve Got This!

We totally understand the ups and downs that come with fitness. It’s not always easy, but it’s worth it. Remember, it’s not about having a flawless routine or getting the "perfect" body—it’s about making small, consistent changes that help you feel your best. Don’t be too hard on yourself, and celebrate the progress you’re making, no matter how small.

So, if you’re feeling discouraged or just need that little push, we’re right here with you. We believe in you, and we know that you’re stronger than you think. Take it one step at a time, and remember—you don’t have to be perfect, you just have to keep going. You've got this!

fields.title: WELCOME TO HERBAL POWER MARKETING PRIVATE LIMITED
fields.content:
At Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited, we steadfastly dedicate ourselves to inspiring individuals to unlock their utmost potential through an unparalleled confluence of exceptional products and an empowering Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) framework. Our mission is both profound and resolute: to catalyse the personal and professional ascension of individuals by offering pioneering health and wellness solutions that not only amplify well-being but also pave the way for success and financial emancipation.

By aligning yourself with Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited, you are not merely investing in products—you are becoming part of an influential, interconnected community where success, wellness, and personal evolution seamlessly converge. Together, we will realize the extraordinary, transforming wellness and prosperity from aspiration into tangible reality. We extend a cordial invitation for you to join us on this invigorating journey, where the fusion of health and success will create a future brimming with boundless potential.

fields.title: WELCOME TO HERBAL POWER MARKETING PRIVATE LIMITED
fields.content:
The doors of Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited stand open to serve you. Our company functions beyond being a health supplement provider because we serve as your reliable Health Companion. Staying healthy in today's fast-paced world presents constant obstacles to many people. Our services exist to support your wellness journey throughout each phase.

We place your health and happiness at the center of our mission. Our product portfolio incorporates strategies for every dimension of your existence so you can reach total life equilibrium. Our dedicated research-created products serve your nutritional requirements and integrate easily within your daily plan.

Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited works towards the belief that wellness leads to the wholesome fulfillment of life. We want to support your energy levels while helping you reach your best potential and maximize your well-being. 

Who We Are

Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited exists beyond being a standard health supplement business. Our organization remains community-led as we work to assist people in their pursuit of better health together with enhanced well-being. We exist to serve people through expansive support systems that generate beneficial results across various aspects of life development.

We create our products through scientific methods which put safety together with quality and effectiveness at the forefront. We manufacture supplements that enhance your potential while strengthening your health and vitality. 

Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited assembles wellness solutions with business opportunities. Our mission is to assist people to achieve both improved well-being and increased financial prosperity. Our company stands ready to assist you across your entire journey through which you want to achieve fitness objectives and establish enduring financial stability.

Our goal is to make your Mind, Body, and Soul Happy!
fields.vision_description:
Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited exists to generate positive changes that improve people's lives. Our Company dedicates itself to advancing health along with personal and financial development. We connect evidence-driven products with tested business methods to enable people in every life domain.

 

Our primary objective is to let people access their complete potential through advanced supplements. The company combines advanced scientific research with precise product development techniques to create wellness-oriented formulations that promote body health and general well-being. Our goal is to create natural, safe, and effective solutions that build healthier and more fulfilling lives for all people.

 

Through our system, we strive to empower people for both personal and professional growth. Through our Multi-Level Marketing (MLM) structure, we give people an opportunity to build financial independence.
fields.mission_description:
Every strategic decision at Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited flows from our ethical principles which determine our organizational identity. We strive to maintain absolute standards throughout our operations while letting every contact express our trust along with our principles of quality and integrity.

  • Customer Satisfaction: The delivery of outstanding experiences stands as our primary organizational objective for every one of our customers. As a company, we provide excellent products and services which exceed standard requirements. 

  • Timely Execution: We practice keeping our promises. We maintain strict precision and time constraints to deliver to our customers both products and support without delay. Our reliability together with punctuality serves as the foundation for developing enduring relationships.

  • Transparent Communication: Trust is built on honesty. Effective communication stands as a core value because we maintain open channels that provide honest respectful interactions for every exchange. 

Our fundamental principles push us to deliver superior quality in all our work. Our commitment to building trust and care as an ethical legacy extends through every ethical choice made at Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited.
fields.objective_content:
Nutraceuticals

Nutraceuticals bring together pharmaceutical science with nutrition to provide superior health advantages that go past fundamental dietary needs. Nutraceutical products sourced from food supply both deliver nutritional benefits with medical prevention capabilities required for maintaining wellness and peak health status. 

Nutraceuticals encompass a diverse range of products, including:

  • Dietary Supplements: Dietary supplements provide very high concentrations of vitamins along with minerals, amino acids, and essential fatty acids. These carefully designed supplements help resolve specific health requirements and come in different forms including capsules and powders.

  • Functional Foods: Everyday foods receive bioactive compounds or essential nutrient fortification to improve their nutritional value. Some examples of functional foods include omega-3-enriched eggs fortified breakfast cereals and probiotic-rich yogurts This combines addressing specific health requirements with their basic nutritional content.

  • Herbal Products: Natural remedies derived from medicinal plants include turmeric alongside ginseng and ashwagandha. Traditionally people have relied on these products because they contain bioactive compounds that support health and help treat different medical conditions.

  • Natural Extracts: Highest-quality bioactive compounds that scientists have extracted with precision from various natural plant species. Nature provides three key therapeutic agents for human health: omega-3 fatty acids in fish oil, flavonoids in green tea, and curcuminoids in turmeric. Extracts hold remarkable therapeutic power along with supportive capabilities for complete health maintenance.

Modern science unites with natural bounty through nutraceutical products that produce effective tools for health optimization while fighting chronic diseases. Through supplements combined with fortified foods along with plant-based remedies.

Why Choose Us?

Assuming Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited as your partner means you select an organization that puts both your physical well-being and your commercial success first. We integrate our creative thinking with our professional expertise and genuine devotion to achieve healthcare solutions that transcend basic health benefits. Here’s why we stand out:

  • We Empower Health with Wealth: Our motto showcases our determination to support whole-person wellness together with financial expansion. Our organization is devoted to helping you enhance both your physical health alongside your fiscal prosperity. 

  • Science-Driven Approach: Our products result from scientific investigation along with strict requirements to ensure maximum safety and potency. Every supplement we sell has been specifically designed to help you maintain your wellness and boost your vitality. 

  • A Supportive Community: When you join the Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited community you become more than just a customer as you belong to an inclusive network. Our platform serves as a space that empowers everyone to grow through transformation and thrive. 

When you select our company you gain access to a health supplement provider that will guide your path toward better health, personal expansion, and financial accomplishment. As one team we can build a future that combines health with happiness and wealth.

Our Goal

The mission of Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited centers on improving lives through natural health supplements that deliver safety alongside effectiveness and reliability. Our mission is to deliver items that support your health objectives while enabling you to reach a balanced vibrant lifestyle. Our supplement manufacturing process stands at the pinnacle of quality standards to create products that match your wellness transformation needs.

Our organization works to motivate people so they can enjoy their healthiest life to their maximum potential. We dedicate our quality and well-being focus to providing health solutions beyond provider status so we can become your trusted wellness partner for achieving lasting vitality.

“We Empower Your Health with Wealth!”

Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited operates as a health and wellness movement that guides people toward superior physical well-being and future success. Our mission is to build a new era of health and wellness prosperity for the world together with you. We can establish a healthier future when we work together. 

The target market is 18-70-year-old people who are concerned with their health and ready to change their lives, and create new sources of income. The purpose of using our services is to assist persons experiencing difficulties with their weight to feel comfortable and secure in their everyday and professional activities. Key segments include.

  • Health Enthusiasts: Consumers specifically search for supplements and other products that improve their quality of life.

  • Working Professionals: Individuals searching for the combined option of work and income along with some additional flexible earnings. And we are giving some supplements to busy professional people and our supplements are products that can be consumed without any interruption. These delay hunger and aid in weight loss by enhancing metabolism, reducing food intake, and improving body fitness. 

  • Fitness Buffs: People who are physically active and looking for products that will cater to their needs to fit their active lifestyle. The supplements we offer are designed to support weight loss and body fitness. As we all know, they help build muscles, increase metabolism, and speed up recovery thus ensuring that one gets to the best of his/her physical form. 

  • Health First Network: One of the largest and most established MLM companies with a strong distributor base. We are superior in terms of compensation structure and a more recent approach to environmental and product quality.

  • Fit Life with MLM: Specialized in the health and wellness sector more specifically in fitness and nutritional products. Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited distinguishes itself from the competition by being able to provide a wider selection of products as well as more extensive distributor support.

Our competitive advantage is derived from product differentiation where most of our products are of high quality, a well-organized distribution network support system, and third, our firm is committed to the principles of the code of ethics and sustainability. At Herbal Power, our mission is to make people who are concerned about their weight regain confidence and enjoy any activity they are involved in.

MLM Structure

Levels:

  1. Preferred Customer: Entry-level position focused on selling products directly to customers 10% accumulated.

  2. Business associates: Intermediate level responsible for leading a small team of Sales Representatives and achieving team sales targets of 20% accumulated.

  3. Business Executive: Senior position overseeing multiple teams, ensuring sales targets are met, and mentoring Team Leaders 30% accumulated.

  4. Marketing Directors: Top-level role managing large teams, developing strategic plans, and driving overall business growth of 40% accumulated.

  5. Executive Marketing Director: An Executive Marketing Director plays a crucial role in shaping and guiding an organization’s marketing strategy and efforts.

MLM Plan

Business Point (BP)

Discount

Amount

Level

0-99

10%

11999/-

100-299

Executive Marketing Director

Recruitment Bonuses

  • Enrolment Bonus: Distributors receive a one-time bonus of 1000/- for each new distributor they recruit who makes their first purchase.

Minimum Sales Requirement

  • Monthly Sales Target: Members must achieve a maximum of 12000/-including a minimum of 5999/- Self-purchase in personal sales each month to qualify for commissions and bonuses.

Ethical Guidelines

  • Sales Practices: All marketing and sales practices must be honest and transparent. Distributors must avoid making exaggerated claims about product benefits or potential earnings.

  • Compliance: Distributors must follow all company policies and local regulations, maintaining ethical standards in their sales efforts.

CRM Systems

  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM): To maintain and analyze customer and distributor relationships, we employ CRM. This tool tracks customer purchase histories, manages questions, and assists with marketing communication.

  • Distributor Management: This CRM system also handles distributor actions, such as performance, recruitment, and compensation. It supports distributors and provides functions for automated updating and interacting with them.

  • Data Integration: The CRM system will have to mesh with our inventory management and e-commerce platforms for there to be continuity and reliability in all functional areas.

  • Adherence to MLM Laws: It is also important to adhere to all the set Multi-Level Marketing laws and regulations such as the Indian Trade Act. This includes giving accurate information on the earnings that may be expected, conforming to correct marketing practices, and steering clear of all pyramids.

Legal Documents

  • Distributor Agreements: The special distributor agreements will cover the rights and obligations of the distributors, the mode of remunerations, and other matters necessary for the termination of the agreements. These will be written, enforceable, and intended to safeguard the interest of the company and its distributors.

This detailed operations plan guarantees that Herbal Power Marketing Private Limited, remains competitive in its business dealings, and manages the products’ delivery without complications while fully implementing the aspects of technology in running the company and dealing with the customers.
